dsmil-ai.description: DSMIL AI Engine with RAG, 5 models, PQC status, device info

sequential-thinking.description: Structured multi-step reasoning with branching and revisions

memory.description: Persistent knowledge graph for AI memory

fetch.description: Web content fetching with SSRF protection

git.description: Git operations with command injection protection

search-tools.description: Advanced code search with symbol analysis and CodeRank

docs-mcp-server.description: Documentation indexing and search with vector embeddings

metasploit.description: Metasploit Framework integration for security testing and exploitation

maigret.description: Username OSINT across social networks and URL parsing

security-tools.description: 23 security testing tools: Nmap, Nuclei, SQLmap, FFUF, Amass, WPScan, and more for penetration testing

atomic-red-team.description: Atomic Red Team security testing framework - Query, validate, and execute security test cases from MITRE ATT&CK techniques. Search atomics by technique ID, name, platform (Windows/Linux/macOS), validate YAML structure, refresh tests from GitHub. Execution DISABLED by default for safety (enable in controlled test environments only)

codex-cli.description: OpenAI Codex CLI integration for advanced code generation, review, debugging, refactoring, testing, and optimization using GPT-5-Codex models

claude-code.description: High-performance Claude Code with NPU acceleration, Git intelligence (ShadowGit 7-10x faster), agent orchestration (25+ agents), binary IPC (50ns-10µs), and AVX2/AVX-512 SIMD from claude-backups

gemini.description: Google Gemini integration with multimodal support (text/image/video/audio), function calling, code execution, Google Search grounding, thinking mode (extended reasoning), and 2M token context

notebooklm.description: Google NotebookLM-style document research: multi-source Q&A, summaries, FAQs, study guides, synthesis, executive briefings. Powered by Gemini 2.0 Flash with 2M token context for comprehensive document understanding and grounding

screenshot-intelligence.description: Screenshot Intelligence with OCR (PaddleOCR/Tesseract), Vector RAG (Qdrant+BAAI 88%+ accuracy), timeline analysis, event correlation, Telegram/Signal integration, AI-powered anomaly detection, incident management, and SWORD Intelligence compatibility

directeye.description: DIRECTEYE Enterprise Blockchain Intelligence Platform - 35 AI tools: 40+ OSINT services (TruePeopleSearch, HIBP, Snusbase, SpyCloud, AlienVault OTX, Censys, SEC EDGAR, ICIJ), blockchain analysis (entity attribution, sanctions OFAC/UN/EU, transaction tracking, 100K+ labeled addresses), ML analytics (risk scoring, entity resolution, predictive analytics, cross-chain analysis 12+ chains, network analysis), query chaining (person→crypto, corporate investigation), post-quantum cryptography (ML-KEM-1024, ML-DSA-87, AES-256-GCM)
